mapper.update: update product set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, product_unit = #{productUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gcpid = #{gcpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where fspid = #{fspid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select fspid, name, note, start_date, end_date, price, product_unit, image, gcpid from product
